name: Q.B.Z.
description:
Q.B.Z. is a first-person puzzle game that takes place in a mysterious facility containing numerous, complicated puzzles. The player has the ability to control and move giant cubes around in each of the facility’s rooms to solve puzzles that are blocking the way out. Different mechanics allow the player to manipulate the cubes in more advanced ways as the game progresses.

Note:

  • The game does not have the save function. However, each section is small and you can enter any selection from main menu any time.
